description: Try our easy to follow Rhubarb & Sour Cream Loaf Cake recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Rhubarb & Sour Cream Loaf Cake Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: To make the icing, sift icing sugar into a small bowl. Add melted butter and 1-2 tbs warm water, a little at a time, stirring until the desired consistency is achieved. Spoon icing over cake and top with reserved rhubarb. Serve while still warm.
